mapper.insert: insert into movie(moviename,type, duration, introduction, release_date,author,production) values (#{moviename},#{type},#{duration},#{introduction},#{releaseDate},#{author},#{production});
mapper.select: select moviename, photo, type, duration, introduction, release_date as releaseDate,score,author,production,status from movie where moviename=#{moviename};
select moviename, photo, type, duration, introduction, release_date as releaseDate,score,author,production,status from movie where status!=-1;
mapper.insert: update movie set photo=#{photo} where moviename=#{moviename};
mapper.select: select id from movie where moviename=#{moviename}
mapper.update:
update movie
photo=#{photo},
type=#{type},
duration=#{duration},
introduction=#{introduction},
release_date=#{releaseDate},
production=#{production},
status=#{status}
where moviename=#{moviename};
mapper.select: select moviename from movie where status=0;
select moviename from movie where status=1;
mapper.update: update movie set status=1 where moviename=#{moviename};
update movie set status=-1 where moviename=#{moviename};
